lab4.data

Class GomokuGameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • lab4.data.GomokuGameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class GomokuGameState
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    Represents the state of a game of Gomoku.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GomokuGameState(lab4.client.GomokuClient gc)
      Takes a game client as a parameter and adds it as an observer.

      Attempts to place a tile in a specified square.

      Starts a new game with the current client.

      • GomokuGameState

        public GomokuGameState(lab4.client.GomokuClient gc)
        Takes a game client as a parameter and adds it as an observer. Creates a game grid.
        Parameters:
        gc - The client used to communicate with the other player.

        public void newGame()
        Starts a new game with the current client.

      • receivedNewGame

        public void receivedNewGame()
        Other player has requested a new game. The game state is changed accordingly.

      • otherGuyLeft

        public void otherGuyLeft()
        The connection to the other player is lost, so the game is interrupted.

        Disconnects the player from the client.

        y - The y coordinate of the placed tile.

      • cheatModeOn

        public boolean cheatModeOn()
        Is the cheat mode on?
